select.event_by_enseignant_id: SELECT * FROM Evenement inner join Ref_Discipline ON Evenement.id_discipline = Ref_Discipline.id_disc Where Evenement.enseignant = ?
select.all_absence_beetween_two_dates: SELECT * FROM Absence INNER JOIN Evenement ON Evenement.heure_debut > ? AND Evenement.heure_fin < ? AND Absence.evenement = Evenement.id_ev
select.event_by_date_and_classroom: SELECT * FROM `Evenement` WHERE `heure_debut`=? AND `heure_fin`=? AND `classe`=? AND `salle`=?

insert.evenement: INSERT INTO Evenement (id_discipline, niveau, classe, salle, date, heure_debut, heure_fin, enseignant) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
